links.title: Tesla battery degradation at less than 10% after over 160,000 miles, according to latest data
links.description: Battery degradation is one of the biggest concerns for electric car owners and potential buyers, but data from Tesla battery packs have been very reassuring so far. Now the latest data shows less than 10% degradation of the energy capacity after over 160,000 miles on Tesla's battery packs.
